cards.flavor:
Der Löwe zwinkerte
-Ausdruck der Femeref für "noch einmal davongekommen sein"
cards.name: Jamuraan Lion
cards.text: {W}, {T}: Target creature can't block this turn.

cards.flavor: Only the warrior who can admit mortal weakness will be bolstered by immortal strength.
cards.name: Angelic Blessing
cards.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

cards.name: Breath of Life
cards.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

cards.name: Fireball
cards.text:
This spell costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of targets.

cards.name: Blue Elemental Blast
cards.text:
Choose one -
• Counter target red spell.
• Destroy target red permanent.

cards.flavor: The enthusiasm of the young, sharpened by the discipline of a soldier.
cards.name: Eager Cadet

cards.flavor:
". . . Before honor is humility."
-The Bible, Proverbs 15:33
cards.name: Knight Errant

cards.flavor: Hunter by instinct, weapon by training.
cards.name: Royal Falcon
cards.text: Flying

cards.name: Scent of Cinder
cards.text: Reveal any number of red cards in your hand. Scent of Cinder deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of cards revealed this way.

cards.flavor: Quick enough to avoid jhovalls when alone and fierce enough to attack them in packs, the hounds were as at home in the mountains as the Mercadians were atop theirs.
cards.name: Lightning Hounds
cards.text: First strike

cards.flavor:
"As it moved, the wurm's spines gathered up bits of flowstone, which took the shapes of dead villagers' heads. Each head spoke a single sound, but if taken together, they said, 'Alas for the living.'"
-Dal myth of the wurm
cards.name: Spined Wurm

cards.flavor: Two little goblins, out in the sun. Down came a griffin, and then there was one.
cards.name: Wild Griffin
cards.text: Flying

cards.flavor: Funny how money and war travel so well together.
cards.name: Warmonger
cards.text: {2}: Warmonger deals 1 damage to each creature without flying and each player. Any player may activate this ability.

cards.name: Silver Drake
cards.text:
Flying
When Silver Drake enters, return a white or blue creature you control to its owner's hand.

cards.flavor: At the sight of the thing the calamari vendor's eyes went wide, but from fear or avarice none could tell.
cards.name: Giant Octopus

cards.flavor: It takes no prisoners, but it keeps the choicest bits for Phyrexia.
cards.name: Phyrexian Rager
cards.text: When Phyrexian Rager enters, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

cards.flavor: The undisputed master of the mountains of Shiv.
cards.name: Shivan Dragon
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
{R}: Shivan Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: One part unstoppable force, one part immovable object.
cards.name: Darksteel Juggernaut
cards.text:
Indestructible
Darksteel Juggernaut's power and toughness are each equal to the number of artifacts you control.
Darksteel Juggernaut attacks each combat if able.

cards.flavor: "I see the weaknesses you hide even from yourself."
cards.name: Cunning Sparkmage
cards.text:
Haste
{T}: Cunning Sparkmage deals 1 damage to any target.

cards.flavor:
"Her mind is an incredible mix of emotion and power. Even if I could grasp it, I couldn't hold it for long."
-Jace Beleren, on Chandra Nalaar
cards.name: Chandra's Outrage
cards.text: Chandra's Outrage deals 4 damage to target creature and 2 damage to that creature's controller.

cards.flavor: Where air meets water, fish meets talon.
cards.name: Sea Eagle
cards.text: Flying

cards.flavor: "I've lit most everything on fire-trees, rocks, even the water. Now it's time to burn the clouds."
cards.name: Chandra's Spitfire
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever an opponent is dealt noncombat damage, Chandra's Spitfire gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Like the tide, time both ebbs and flows.
cards.name: Time Ebb
cards.text: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.

cards.name: Kuldotha Phoenix
cards.text:
Flying, haste
Metalcraft - {4}: Return Kuldotha Phoenix from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only during your upkeep and only if you control three or more artifacts.

cards.flavor: Its swamp cousin may be meaner, but the vizzerdrix is much bigger.
cards.name: Vizzerdrix

cards.flavor: 嘘と霧から生み出されたものにも関わらず、その飢えと怒りは力を持つ。
cards.name: Phantasmal Dragon
cards.text:
Flying
When Phantasmal Dragon becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.

cards.flavor:
"We've run aground sandbars before, but today, a sandbar ran aground us."
-Kipkemboi, Kukemssa pirate
cards.name: Sandbar Crocodile
cards.text: Phasing (This phases in or out before you untap during each of your untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.)

cards.flavor:
"You returned a warrior. . . . Your hair was cut, your eye tattooed with the red triangle of war."
-"Love Song of Night and Day"
cards.name: Zhalfirin Knight
cards.text:
Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)
{W}{W}: Zhalfirin Knight gains first strike until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
"Kaervek believes the drakes' cries herald his victory; in truth, they mourn aloud for his impending demise."
-Teferi
cards.name: Shrieking Drake
cards.text:
Flying
When Shrieking Drake enters, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.

cards.flavor: The touch of death is never gentle.
cards.name: Hand of Death
cards.text: Destroy target nonblack creature.

cards.name: Stream of Life
cards.text: Target player gains X life.

cards.flavor: Rain from this storm leaves you pinned to the ground like an insect.
cards.name: Thorn Elemental
cards.text: You may have Thorn Elemental assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

cards.name: Parallax Dementia
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Fading 1 (This enchantment enters with one fade counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)
Enchanted creature gets +3/+2.
When Parallax Dementia leaves the battlefield, destroy enchanted creature. That creature can't be regenerated.

cards.flavor:
"Things are going to change around here."
-Crovax
cards.name: Ascendant Evincar
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Other black creatures get +1/+1.
Nonblack creatures get -1/-1.

cards.name: Archangel
cards.text: Flying, vigilance

cards.flavor:
「誰でも死後に思い出してもらえるかは心配なもの。でも心配ないわ、死は名も無き者のものよ。あなたに名前がある限リ、それを堂々と掲げなさい。」
――リリアナ
cards.name: Cast Down
cards.text: Destroy target nonlegendary creature.

cards.name: Diabolic Edict
cards.text: Target player sacrifices a creature.

cards.flavor: Meant to cut through the body and burn straight to the soul.

cards.text: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.

cards.flavor: Just because they have a club doesn't mean they're organized.
cards.name: Mons's Goblin Raiders

cards.flavor:
電光は魂と世界をつなぎ合わせるまのだ。
――コーの格言

――ウォジェクの警備兵、クラム

cards.text: Lava Coil deals 4 damage to target creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

cards.flavor: Assault and battery included.

Daxos's toughness is equal to your devotion to white. (Each {W} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to white.)

cards.text:

cards.flavor: All orggs know how to kill; training teaches them what to kill.
cards.name: Trained Orgg

cards.flavor:

---ファイレクシア経典

Flying

Enchant land

cards.name: Harald, King of Skemfar
cards.text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
When Harald, King of Skemfar enters, look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal an Elf, Warrior, or Tyvar card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

cards.flavor: 探検家にとっては、かけがえのない財宝。カニにとっては、頼れる我が家。

cards.text: Landfall - Whenever a land you control enters, each opponent mills three cards. (To mill a card, a player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.)

cards.name: Avalanche Riders
cards.text:
Haste
Echo {3}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Avalanche Riders enters, destroy target land.

cards.flavor: An inferno is just a gesture away.
cards.name: Pyromancer's Gauntlet
cards.text: If a red instant or sorcery spell you control or a red planeswalker you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals that much damage plus 2 to that permanent or player instead.

cards.name: Culling the Weak
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Add {B}{B}{B}{B}.

cards.flavor: Grant limitless flight through the clouds, into battle, and across hardwood floors.
cards.name: Winged Boots
cards.text:
Equipped creature has flying and ward {4}. (Whenever equipped creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {4}.)
Equip {1}

cards.name: Goro-Goro, Disciple of Ryusei
cards.text:
{R}: Creatures you control gain haste until end of turn.
{3}{R}{R}: Create a 5/5 red Dragon Spirit creature token with flying. Activate only if you control an attacking modified creature. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)

cards.flavor: タールルームの言葉に、「驚かされる」という言い方はない。
cards.name: Talruum Champion
cards.text:
First strike
Whenever Talruum Champion blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, that creature loses first strike until end of turn.

cards.flavor: もっとも堅牢な壁とは、石の壁でも鋼の壁でもなく、力を合わせた戦士たちの壁である。
cards.name: Shield Wall
cards.text: Creatures you control get +0/+2 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: "The tempest is the only ally I need."
cards.name: Raiyuu, Storm's Edge
cards.text:
First strike
Whenever a Samurai or Warrior you control attacks alone, untap it. If it's the first combat phase of the turn, there is an additional combat phase after this phase.

cards.flavor: スクイーは、同情と安堵が入り交じった気持ちで、カイレンの同類たちが死ぬのを見ていた。
cards.name: Snuff Out
cards.text:
If you control a Swamp, you may pay 4 life rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

cards.name: Lay Down Arms
cards.text: Exile target creature with mana value less than or equal to the number of Plains you control. Its controller gains 3 life.

cards.name: Cut Down
cards.text: Destroy target creature with total power and toughness 5 or less.

cards.flavor: The farmer was amazed to see the penny vanish into thin air, but the goose knew he'd just slipped it to the faerie.
cards.name: Sleight of Hand
cards.text: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.

cards.name: Saryth, the Viper's Fang
cards.text:
Other tapped creatures you control have deathtouch.
Other untapped creatures you control have hexproof.
{1}, {T}: Untap another target creature or land you control.

cards.name: Liesa, Forgotten Archangel
cards.text:
Flying, lifelink
Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, return that card to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.
If a creature an opponent controls would die, exile it instead.
